classData.comment:
/**
 * The worker manager lives inside the main thread and creates the App, Data & VDom worker.
 * Also, responsible for sending messages from the main thread to the different workers.
 * @class Neo.worker.Manager
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @singleton
 */
classData.description: The worker manager lives inside the main thread and creates the App, Data & VDom worker. Also, responsible for sending messages from the main thread to the different workers.
classData.name: Manager

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.worker.Manager'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {Boolean} singleton=true
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: singleton

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {Number} activeWorkers=0
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: activeWorkers

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String[]} appNames=[]
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: appNames

classData.comment:
/**
         * The base path for the worker file URLs, can e.g. get set inside the index.html.
         * @member {String|null} basePath=Neo.config.workerBasePath || 'worker/'
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: The base path for the worker file URLs, can e.g. get set inside the index.html.
classData.name: basePath

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {Number} constructedThreads=0
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: constructedThreads
mixins

classData.comment:
/**
         * True in case the current browser supports window.SharedWorker.
         * @member {Boolean} sharedWorkersEnabled=false
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: True in case the current browser supports window.SharedWorker.
classData.name: sharedWorkersEnabled

classData.comment:
/**
         * Internal flag to stop the worker communication in case their creation fails
         * @member {Boolean} stopCommunication=false
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: Internal flag to stop the worker communication in case their creation fails
classData.name: stopCommunication

classData.comment:
/**
         * True in case the current browser supports window.Worker.
         * The neo.mjs framework is not able to run without web workers.
         * @member {Boolean} sharedWorkersEnabled=false
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: True in case the current browser supports window.Worker. The neo.mjs framework is not able to run without web workers.
classData.name: sharedWorkersEnabled

classData.comment:
/**
         * Using the current timestamp as an unique window identifier
         * @member {Number} windowId=new Date().getTime()
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: Using the current timestamp as an unique window identifier
classData.name: windowId

classData.comment:
/**
         * Contains the fileNames for the App, Data & Vdom workers
         * @member {Object} workers
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: Contains the fileNames for the App, Data & Vdom workers
classData.name: workers

classData.comment:
/**
     * navigator.serviceWorker.controller can be null in case we load a page for the first time
     * or in case of a force refresh.
     * See: https://www.w3.org/TR/service-workers/#navigator-service-worker-controller
     * Only in this case main.addon.ServiceWorker will store the active registration once ready here.
     * @member {ServiceWorker|null} serviceWorker=null
     */
classData.description: navigator.serviceWorker.controller can be null in case we load a page for the first time or in case of a force refresh. See: https://www.w3.org/TR/service-workers/#navigator-service-worker-controller Only in this case main.addon.ServiceWorker will store the active registration once ready here.
classData.name: serviceWorker
construct

classData.comment:
/**
     * Sends a message to each worker defined inside the this.workers config.
     * @param {Object} msg
     */
classData.description: Sends a message to each worker defined inside the this.workers config.
classData.name: broadcast

classData.description: Creates a web worker using the passed options as well as adding error & message event listeners.
classData.name: createWorker

classData.description: Calls createWorker for each worker inside the this.workers config.
classData.name: createWorkers

loadApplication

classData.comment:
/**

promiseForwardMessage

classData.comment:
/**
     * @param {String} dest app, canvas, data or vdom
     * @param {Object} opts configs for Neo.worker.Message
     * @param {Array} [transfer] An optional array of Transferable objects to transfer ownership of.
     * If the ownership of an object is transferred, it becomes unusable (neutered) in the context it was sent from
     * and becomes available only to the worker it was sent to.
     * @returns {Promise<any>}
     */

params.description: An optional array of Transferable objects to transfer ownership of. If the ownership of an object is transferred, it becomes unusable (neutered) in the context it was sent from and becomes available only to the worker it was sent to.
params.name: transfer

classData.name: promiseMessage
resolveDomOperationPromise

classData.comment:

     * @param {Object} opts configs for Neo.worker.Message
     * @param {Array} [transfer] An optional array of Transferable objects to transfer ownership of.
     * If the ownership of an object is transferred, it becomes unusable (neutered) in the context it was sent from
     * and becomes available only to the worker it was sent to.
     * @returns {Neo.worker.Message}
     * @protected
     */

params.description: An optional array of Transferable objects to transfer ownership of. If the ownership of an object is transferred, it becomes unusable (neutered) in the context it was sent from and becomes available only to the worker it was sent to.
